description: A vulnerability was found in Emlog Pro 2.2.10. It has been declared as problematic. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /admin/twitter.php of the component Whisper Page. The manipulation leads to cross site scripting. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. VDB-260602 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability. NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
